website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy S8 is a gorgeous big-screen phone with a comfortable single-handed feel, and it's packed with top-notch components and promising new software.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable phone
customer_reviews.text: I must say this was a great purchase. I accidentally put this phone in the washer about a year ago with my bedding. After it washed for a full cycle I realized it was missing called my # and saw it ringing in the washer. Took it out... switched it off for a day and I have had no problems with this phone to date!
customer_reviews.author: Lee 1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone... one of the best phones I ever had. The best of all is the camera resolution, and also it's easy functioning.....
customer_reviews.author: MARCELO BRUCKMAN

customer_reviews.title: Phone dead in under 2 months!!!
customer_reviews.text: Brand new S8 phone dead!!! it didn't even make it to 2 months. The seller offers no warranty but at least I could have gotten a good year worth of use. I don't recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: TazMia

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: No complaints, Item arrived with everything as promised. New device and new accessories even though it seemed opened.
customer_reviews.author: Dristan Romel Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, as I expected. It seems to run fast and with a last long batteryI It comes with all accesssories in a sealed box. I recommend i!
customer_reviews.author: Blackeagle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes but it still had the google lock on it
customer_reviews.author: kairon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. It's very exotic and classy both for men and women.
customer_reviews.author: Anisa S.

customer_reviews.title: There are some nice impovements over the galaxy s7 and some additional features ...
customer_reviews.text: There are some nice impovements over the galaxy s7 and some additional features so loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Miller

customer_reviews.title: Lovely phone.  Network issues. Waste of money.  Purchase in your country.
customer_reviews.text: Having major issues with local network. Constant error messages "not registered on network ". Will not be able to keep the phone. Service not reliable or incompatible with my local network. Don't trust when they say it's the international version. Waste of good money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: Finally one that is as-advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Finally one that is as-advertised! This was my 3rd attempt at getting the Exynos model - the other 2 had been models U and U1 even though they were being advertised as the "International" version. This one is a true model F from Italy though and allowed me to set it up exactly how I wanted. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: E. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone and great price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone and great price. All US GSM sim cards work fine(I tried T mobile, ATT and LYCA). Phone is brand new but i guess seal comes broken to get rid of region lock. Lot of features and great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Tarundeep Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Useing it rite now.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best phone i have ever owned hands down battery life needs a bit improvement but it is better than the iphones battery life by far everthing worked as it should.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous user

customer_reviews.title: Be wary of seller - Non EU region phone
customer_reviews.text: Be ware if the seller is "InovaTech Global Limited", the camera failed for us just over a month (past return date) and after calling Amazon who then put us through to Samsung who were going to repair, until we read out the serial number, they then said while it was a manufacturing issue with that batch, it was not an EU region phone and they wouldn't touch it. Thankfully Amazon sorted this out for us, so top hats to them for being very supportive on this, but it was a very squeaky bum moment when we thought we were going to be abandoned with a duff phone!
customer_reviews.author: G. Bennie

customer_reviews.title: I love my brand new Galaxy S8 - seller SmartTechStore
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Galaxy S8 from SmartTechStore and paid for special delivery at the checkout (around £12). Ordered it on Friday at 12 pm and received it on Saturday 10.30 am, less than 24 hours! The phone was brand new with European SIM Lock and German instructions. After turning it on, I selected the language and followed the setup instructions. I'm very happy with the phone and the service provided by the seller. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mateo

customer_reviews.title: Phone turned off before I finished set up and won't turn back on!!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the phone everything looked fine and was working well. However, during initial set up the phone suddenly switched off and will now not respond to anything. I've tried resetting it and holding down the power button but nothing works. When I plug in the charger, the LED doesn't light up and after a few hours nothing has changed. I'm submitting a return request with the seller now.
customer_reviews.author: Nour

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy S8 (Another win by Samsung)
customer_reviews.text: Top quality product, upgraded from S6edge so knew Samsung ways but this is excellent. No more bloated apps, just refined to Microsoft and Google apps. Software is Android Oreo, and the UI add-ons have been finally kept to a minimum allowing you to enjoy the OS not just Samsung's offering. Beautiful screen, great cameras, fast Bio logins, a joy to use, and while people moan over Bixby it's not that bad, but hey Google Assistant is baked into a long press of the Home Button without needing to change anything. Obviously you can add others too but the defaults are great.
customer_reviews.author: David Isherwood

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money... poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Seller refused to reply to questions about a fault. Screen damage within a year. Power button developed a fault.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Phone As Promised!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the phone. Came with all packaging sealed and phone is legit. Checked IMEI number and it's real. Recommend this phone very much.
customer_reviews.author: Krzysztof

customer_reviews.title: Best phone in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: I had samsung phones for a few years and in the past 4 years i was a iphone user as i switched from iphone 6s to samsung s8......but i have to say that no phone compares to this s8 . It is by far the best and most beautifull phone i had ! I bought it from Seagull-UK and it came sealed brand new for a decent discount . I recommend this seller
customer_reviews.author: Alin C.

customer_reviews.title: From thousands of phones, one must be DOE
customer_reviews.text: A phone that could not phone. My came with a broken antenna. I guess these things happen. But texting was difficult too, as the touch screen was too sensitive. And maybe there was more wing with it, but the battery indicator seemed to work as a count down. You could literally see the numbers ticking away.
customer_reviews.author: Infinible

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, just make sure to be careful...
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost, I was very happy with the speed of delivery and quality of packaging. The phone, as expected, was in pristine condition with all the relevant parts provided. No fault at all by the sellers. As a few of my friends have already damaged their S8s/S9s, I made it a compulsory action to buy a case as well as a tempered glass case. The screen is slightly curved on the sides, proving to be slightly more prone to damage upon heavy contact. If you find that, like myself, you're a little bit clumsy, you're better off to invest an extra £20 in a good case and screen protector rather than being sorry. Hope this helps anyone speculating :)
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and the phone is amazing! This price was also by far the cheapest I had seen and saved me a fortune compared with what I was quoted in EE. The picture quality is great, the handset is sleek looking, has good battery life and is easy to use. The fingerprint sensor on the back is handy. Only downside is that whilst the curved screen looks great it means that screen protectors won’t stay on, even when I bought one designed for this phone it lasted not even 2 days which is apparently because of the shape of the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Garwood

customer_reviews.title: Good user experience overall
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a few years now and will be upgrading soon. I have to say, this phone has served me well. The UI has been great, the updates have been good and overall a very good user experience. One thing I've had constant issues with is the camera blurring everytime I start it up. I've read online that many users have had this problem. I usually have to shake the phone for the bluriness to go away. This is a bit annoying as you can miss the chance to take a photo. But generally, it has been a smooth running phone. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Faiza S.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone but faulty
customer_reviews.text: I received this phone 6 months ago and everything was working fine, good phone, great picture and fast enough. But suddently after 6 months in the out of the blue I was using it normal and half display on the left side became black. I could touch but I couldn't see anything. With the assistant we tried to fix but nothing changed and I had to ask for a refund. Im happy about the service but I wasn't expecting this kind of problem from samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Davide Causo

customer_reviews.title: Faulty and dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not only a disaster but could have blown up! The phone stopped working and I took it to the official samsung repair shop. After opening it and checking it, they told me that the pieces were faulty and put in in such a way that I was lucky it didn't blow up! I strongly advise to avoid this buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Kalnai

customer_reviews.title: Camera broken and no support from the seller
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone mainly for its camera. While it works perfectly in selfie mode, it doesn't work in a normal mode, the image is completely blurred. It's strange because in the past, switching the phone on and off was helping but not anymore. The camera stays blurred for a couple of days and then goes back to sharpness without me doing anything. It's extremely annoying, I never know when I'm going to be able to take a photo and for how long the front camera will remain blurred! I asked the seller for advise but there was no reply, so I'm feeling really sad about it.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far.
customer_reviews.text: Had a bit of hassle to set up initially, as the language was set to Hungarian (I had to Google some words to figure it out, and then Google words to get through the menus to change it to English) and the touch input was some bizarre method, having to double tap options before swiping etc. Once I had reset to factory defaults and then changed it to English (which would have been very challenging to someone who wasn't as technically able as me) it was a doddle to set up. Performance is good. Face unlock is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Neil S.

customer_reviews.title: I don't love it.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is quite long and thin and incredibly slippery; I dropped it within the first week and smashed the screen, but to be fair, it remained intact and I continue using it with the smashed face. So I would recommend a cover asap, unless you are less clumsy than me. Otherwise it does what a phone should do. I've given up on the fingerprint recognition and just use a PIN number. And the Bixby is quite annoying: I don't want to use it but it's difficult not to press the button as it's opposite the switch on button.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Won’t support WiFi calling or 4g!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a uk phone so will not support WiFi calling or 4g I spoke to Samsung and they said it was manufactured for Madagascar or someware these features are not available
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This replaces my previous Galaxy 6, which was suffering modern apps issues. I am very impressed with battery life, which seems to last me at least two days between charges. The display is what you'd expect from Samsung - immensely detailed and sharp. The processor is fast enough for everything I want it to do; very responsive. I'm a bit disappointed that FM radio has been abandoned, but I suppose most people will use their data allowance to stream. Overall a satisfactory purchase - no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: DansGranddad

customer_reviews.title: Not UK supplied Samsung phone
customer_reviews.text: Good phone, should have gone for the dual SIM as I thought this was an official Samsung packed phone, however was a European one with the UK plug packed separately.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs A Tankaria

customer_reviews.title: Good phone.
customer_reviews.text: Writing review and giving a rate it pushes me to play the compare card. As I cannot give it a honest opinion without comparing it to my previous phone (iPhone). Overall s8 is a great phone and definitely worth the money but after a year of usage, I would say: "save up a little bit more money and get yourself an iPhone." Sorry samsung fanboys, But not a hardware is the downgrade in relation between user and smartphone but software. Android its being slow, stupid at some tasks and crashing many times.
customer_reviews.author: Marcin Geborski

customer_reviews.title: Not very robust
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd galaxy S8. Although I always use a good case and screen protector the last 2 phones were badly damaged when I dropped them. I do find S8 easy to use so bought this 3rd phone for that reason and because I needed one quick. I think they are more susceptible to damage because of the bevelled edge. I've just spent £20 on what I hope is a good screen and case for this phone do hope it works
customer_reviews.author: michelle wilson

customer_reviews.title: Best phone ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone a while ago so wanted to give it time to use then comment on it firstly prompt delivery and item as described secondly I must say this phone is awesome and really brilliant to use I would definitely recommend to all my family and friends. It's so easy to set up. And I say one of the best purchases I have made on Amazon and price was remarkably thank you seller.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Bye-bye Windows Phone
customer_reviews.text: Finally moved from Windows Phone and I'm beginning to be converted (and using as many Microsoft apps as possible). Still some quirks and annoyances to do with (Google) Android and Samsung pre-installs (bloatware/crapware) but mightily impressed overall.
customer_reviews.author: Wm

customer_reviews.title: Best of its class for its age. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Good form factor, size, weight. Indeed probably the best at this price. Still good after all these years. So much has been written already about this device, so no need to dwell here. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: goron59

customer_reviews.title: not a UK phone
customer_reviews.text: it come earlier from the day it suppose to come,also the box of the phone was shield and everything was new BUT the phone is not from the UK and i can not register the phone for the warranty at Samsung UK...probably it is from Italy ,that is why i put three stars..the phone is excellent and brand new but not from the UK,seller: Seagull-UK.
customer_reviews.author: nikos

customer_reviews.title: Clearly a Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: The phone that I received was obviously fake. I used to own the same model supplied by EE. This clone has a plastic rear glass and was noticably lighter. Not only this, but the IMEI number did not register as being valid... and... the printing on the back of the phone was not even parallel to the outer edges of the phone itself. This is supposedly recommended by Amazon. Shocking. I may add photographs later if possible, . Amazon, what are you playing at?
customer_reviews.author: Rhea P.

customer_reviews.title: Great new phone, super quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: I'm really sceptical about ordering from places like here when it comes to phones, but I was really pleased. Firstly it arrived 4 days early, a pleasant surprise after a long day at work - even with a little bag of Haribo on top (it really had been a long day, this made it better) I haven't had any problems with the device, it was in it's original packaging with a double seal and all the right accessories. It had a 2 pin plug but they packed me a 3 pin separately in the box. Really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great image quality (screen and camera). SINGLE SIM!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect phone... Perfect size for me as it's not big. Quality of the screen is incredible, as well as the camera. Very nice aspect. PROBLEM: SINGLE SIM!!! It has room for two Sims bit only reads one, so if you need double Sim is not your option If useful review please vote helpful review!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz Arranz Hierro

customer_reviews.title: Was unsure about purchase initially but seagull came up with the goods 😀
customer_reviews.text: I love it.. I have taken precautions of attaching a hard glass screen overlay and a shell case and a ring... Only problem I had was connecting to O2 free WiFi at my gym but that's been resolved via an online forum. I am a Tesco mobile customer and my sim works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: cazzymc

customer_reviews.title: Good phone for those who want a smart phone but not fussed about getting the latest model.
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone as an upgrade from a s6 (it was on it's way out after a few years). To me there is little difference between the s6 and s8, other than price. I looked into getting the s9 and s10 but again, there looked little difference between them. The s8 is good phone if you're not fussed about having the latest model.
customer_reviews.author: purple gerbil

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to this from my old HTC one M9 and I haven't owned a Samsung smartphone since maybe 10 years ago, but I loved this phone very much. The fingerprint reader is a pain though because I have small fingers and I need to cover the whole sensor for it to unlock, which doesn't work very well for me. I like the functions and it's a easy to use phone, for a decent price. Glad I made the right decision.
customer_reviews.author: Perrie

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor/Budget Speakers & Earphones
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are god awful. The sound is muffled, and sounds very cheap. I cant even get througha youtube video without noticing how bad the speakers are. The earphones that come with the phone is god awful aswell. Seriously the quality is less than what you would get from a 99p shop. The phone itself.. Well nothing differenent from other versions. Yes, it has a bunch of features that you will probably never use. I had an s5 which was amazing, but old and slow. I honestly should of just got another s5 because this phone is not worth £364. There is a 80% chance i will return this phone.. because i feel robbed.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Good phone,
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for the price. Although I have noticed the phone is not certified with good because of the rom on it. Works in the uk very well but some apps on google play like netflix I cannot download due to the rom on it. Potentially issue with Google Play apps. I have another Samsung S8 and I can download these apps. Only difference if the Software service SW version using XEU/XEU/XEO. My other phone has XEU/XEU/XEU no issues with google play. European sim card required on box. Giff Gaff UK sim card worked ok. Other than that it works.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Prescott

customer_reviews.title: Runs apps fast, good battery life
customer_reviews.text: A great upgrade from my S5. Apps run fast, the latest OS is intuitive. The hardware is fully featured. Battery life is good (I get two days from a charge). Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sinjun

customer_reviews.title: Former flagship model but still slick
customer_reviews.text: The finger print reader works OK, but as others have noted, is not particularly easy to access and is too close to the camera lens. The phone is fast, has good memory and an excellent camera which is why I purchased it. With the exception of the Bixby feature which I have not tried, all the features works well. Samsung's smart switch made it easy to transfer all my apps and data to this phone from my previous Samsung A3.
customer_reviews.author: Alan H.

customer_reviews.title: A best little phone.
customer_reviews.text: It was a difficult job deciding on a replacement for my iPhone 5 which was showing its age. Finally I joined Which for a month and read all I could. I chose the S8 because of the review and it was within my price range. I'm not able to give a technical review because my skills with IT are small in comparison to most reviewers on here. I am impressed by the length of battery time, the face recognition, the ease of use and the size of the phone. I've bought a cover for it because I think it would easily get dropped because it's quite slippery. I love the orchid grey too. It's very understated!
customer_reviews.author: Spaxton

customer_reviews.title: First class Samsung Galaxy S8. Brand new and in a sealed box with manufacturers guarantee.
customer_reviews.text: I feel that this Samsung Galaxy S8 is a fabulous product and a great price. I made enquiries with the seller about various items regarding the phones use in the UK, and everything turned out to be as they said. I have registered it with Samsung for the 2 year guarantee, and everything is working fine. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Stocker

customer_reviews.title: S8 Mobile phone love it
customer_reviews.text: Received my S8 in a matter of 2 days from ordering, brand new in sealed box I'm not very technical so do struggle with new devices but found easy to set up and find my way round things really great phone nice and slim great clear picture and screen is fab would recommend this seller and will use again not used fingerprint reader or face recognition
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great phone, but over complex...however much better than an i phone
customer_reviews.text: I was on android, then I got bought an I-phone on contract as a pressie... I hated the I-phone... this phone gives me the freedom of choice about what I put on it and what options I have... a good all round phone albeit a bit complicated from what I remember on android...
customer_reviews.author: Tony Dean.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: Turned up quicker than expected, in a great condition for the seller and was very easy to switch the sim card over and transfer all my files and settings across. Doesn't come with any accessories, but seeing as I was replacing a broken screen and LCD this didn't bother me
customer_reviews.author: B. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy cheap unbranded mobiles and I have wasted a lot of money by doing so. And now for first time I bought the Samsung s8 and wow what a difference. It's quick, responsive and most importantly does what you ask of it when needed. Runs smoothly, seamlessly switching between apps when required, takes fantastic pictures and the videos are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Rudi

customer_reviews.title: My first samsung
customer_reviews.text: It's my first samsung or an android phone and I must confess I'm beyond impressed. I have always been an iPhone person but after this I don't believe I will be switching back to iPhone anytime soon. Love the SD card slot, however, the downside is the fingerprint reader which it located at the back, makes it a bit tricky to use but overall it's great
customer_reviews.author: Nasaf Virk

customer_reviews.title: Good all rounder
customer_reviews.text: I like the phone but why is the fingerprint reader on the back by the camera? Really strange because you have to turn it over to unlock it. Other than that- all round good phone. I upgraded from an S6 but in retrospect would probably just buy another S6 because they're cheaper and the S8 doesn't seem noticeably better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is an excellent phone and very good for older customers like myself.
customer_reviews.text: I did alot of research on mobile phones as I had a Nokia "Brick" and decided I had to move to a modern phone. The phone which seemed to suit my needs was the Samsung Galaxy S8, delivered on the 28th August to my home. I am now learning how to work the phone and really looking forward to the journey and joining the 21st century.
customer_reviews.author: Liz James

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone honestly, it's a year or so old now, so even though its older than the s10 it's pretty new Good phone Cons It can get a little hot, so just dunk it in some water if need be (water, not other liquids) Sometimes your finger can nudge the screen given it's a curved screen, this is easily adaptable and it doesn't really happen now.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone has been simply amazing. The screen is sharp, the camera is great and the battery life was good considering the use. My only niggles are that the finger print reader doesn't work well when the official case is fitted and you can look a bit daft getting the retina scan to unlock the phone. Otherwise, excellent.
customer_reviews.author: MeUgY

customer_reviews.title: Great phone would buy over and over again
customer_reviews.text: Had this now for close to two ish years. Great phone, great camera, finger prints recognition and always on display are great. Get a screen protector (so your keys doesn't scratch in your pocket) and a small case (mine was only 10eur) and my phone looks like it's still brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Same as from High Street, UK spec.
customer_reviews.text: This phone came in exactly the same state as one from Carphone Warehouse. Security seals all in place, and came with a UK charger. Registered Serial number with Samsung, no issues. Would not hesitate to order again from Smarttech Store.
customer_reviews.author: Mr G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, no issue.
customer_reviews.text: It's a perfect phone, no issue with it at all. Make sure you click on 'new', then won't be a problem and will be double sealed. Mine was from Germany, but could change the language to English when I started to install the phone. I had an Iphone 6 before this, now I'm really glad I changed to this one. The battery life is good compare to my other phone. I charge it after 1 - 1.5 day. Arrived in 2 days, so it was a really fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: vicreed

customer_reviews.title: Samsung S8
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for my damaged S8+. Proven to be an excellent phone. Quality is excellent and love the expendable storage. If you can put up with the idea that it isn't the latest device in the lineup then you are likely to be very satisfied with it for this price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone if you dont want to spend £1000 on the latest model, could be improved though.
customer_reviews.text: An all round good phone. Good screen size (maybe a little too big for holding in one hand), good battery life and extension features, apps run and switch smoothly, haven't had any issues thus far. My one complaint would be some minor annoying features such as the torch doesn't turn on when the battery is low. Like the end of the day when it is dark and my battery is low is the exact time I want to use a torch. Please let me take control of my own mistakes Samsung, your not helping by limiting the ability of my device.
customer_reviews.author: A guy who uses a phone

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Got to replace a S5 mini and WOW, why didn't I do it sooner. Purchased from JB INT, phone arrived earlier than expected. Had to change language when first turned on from Italian which was extremely easy to do, am now a very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly7474

customer_reviews.title: A great product, with huge savings compared to high-street providers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product from Seagull-UK. Couldn't be happier. Package arrived in two days with express delivery, in perfect condition. The only problem with the product was the manuals were in Italian, but user manuals can be found on the Samsung website. All contents of the box were in perfect condition. The phone itself is extremely good, feels light in the hand, has a great camera, and is is an overall very smooth experience. The only negative would be that the battery life sometimes lets you down when using for extended periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: William Manning

customer_reviews.title: The product is very good
customer_reviews.text: The phone is amazing and effective. I am very happy, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone
customer_reviews.text: Received exactly on estimated delivery day. Order was processed and dispatched quickly by techgold. Phone is in pristine condition, works wonderfully, crisp screen resolution. Amazing camera and I'm sure there's more to discover to this phone, as I discover a new feature everyday. Highly recommend the samsung galaxy s8. All round perfect, wonderful phone.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, fingerprint on the back is great
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, love the fingerprint reader on the back, the battery is pretty good (always lasts a day even with fairly heavy use), good size fits in hands and pockets but the screen size is great with the curved screen. Get a screen protector, as my partners broke when he dropped it on its corner.
customer_reviews.author: P Harding

customer_reviews.title: Reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Phone has been very reliable, as bourt with case and older user Finger reconision is inconsitant requiers several attemps, upgrade for none case users to provent random dilling has made phone more pernicity to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic handset :-)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent handset really pleased, great service from seller. As others have mentioned, this is a european model (Italian) but comes with UK plug and not issues with setting the correct language. Any help you need with phone usage can easily be found online. Would definitely recommend this seller and this phone.
customer_reviews.author: thomos

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly. Great product. Good phone with a large capacity. I mainly use phone for photos, so has plenty of storage to accommodate for this.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: This is a good phone
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is good Screen is sharp with vivid colours. The price has fallen a lot because of the release of the Galaxy 10 However technologically this is not so very far bellow the 10 - Superb value
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Pukka phone better than the Sony XZ
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, just buy it if you love Android, this replaced my Sony XZ which kept breaking down on me Bixby is pants but the Bixby button can be re-mapped so no hardship
customer_reviews.author: Shotguncarver

customer_reviews.title: Ye i love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Ye i love this phone. Although the finger print is at the back of the phone, so annoying!!!!!!! Also the curved glass can be chipped easier and the screen protectors wont work. However iys a very good phone at a decent price
customer_reviews.author: connor worth

customer_reviews.title: Really good phone but the camera glitches sometimes and goes fuzzy
customer_reviews.text: Really good phone but the camera glitches sometimes and goes fuzzy, although they would maybe help I cannot send it off as then I would be left with nothing so I have been managing with the glitch but it gets annoying. Other than that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: One of the best phones of 2017!
customer_reviews.text: My best phone so far. It arrived on time (took around 2 weeks for it to get to Spain). Very smooth software, has a lot of customization, camera is amazing (actually the camera was the main reason I got this phone) - definetly one of the best phones of 2017. One thing I don't like is that bixby button, but its easy to remap it to something else. PS. Just get a protective case, cuz the phone is made out of glass - so one drop and bye bye
customer_reviews.author: Deividas

customer_reviews.title: Battery lasts one hour after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: At the beginning this seems like a great phone, works very well and very fast. But now after only 1 year battery lasts only one hour if I'm using the phone, plus the fast charge doesn't work anymore. Just put it to charge with 11% battery and says it will take 36 hours to reach 100% percent again (for it to last one hour again). Definitely not worthy for those who work with their phone or simply use it frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: SELLER: JB INTL
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this phone a while, got stolen and so I bought a replacement. Quality phone with amazing picture display. I cannot fault this phone to be honest. Prefer it to my iphone. Feels exactly how a smartphone should be. User friendly & helps boost productivity. Great seller. Came days before it was expected to arrive (4 days early). No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Mel C

customer_reviews.title: Great, Legitimate Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, new and sealed. All accessories included, such as headphones, USB Type C charger, adapters etc. When I loaded up the phone it was set to a different language - but that's easy to change. Great picture quality, but poor battery life, I would suggest buying a charging case aswell, especially if you don't want to reduce the performance/picture quality in power saving mode. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Rosh

customer_reviews.title: Still A Great Phone!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, no need to upgrade to so as this phone is pretty much identical. This phone still runs Samsung's applications with ease. No slowdowns on this phone, great display!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Convert from iphone
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier. I've had iPhones for the last 8 years so was nervous about switching to android and if I would be able to transfer all my stuff over and get to grips with the different features but I can honestly say it couldn't be easier. Love the phone and so glad I made the switch and am no longer a slave to Apple!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Dowling

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: Unlocked. Well packaged. Comes with all accessories - even an adapter to continue using any micro USB cables. Super fast. GF loves it and loves me for buying her it!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: This is not a UK version of the mobile but it works with a sim from one of our service providers. Fantastic value for money. Very pleased with the mobile which was delivered within a week on standard free delivery.
customer_reviews.author: MR S J MAGGS

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant phone - bought from smarttech store
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Samsung S8 phones from SmartTech store, it arrived on time well packaged n sealed. The phone is remarkebly beautiful and has a stunning display. The screen edge is amazing and the phone is very quick to respond. So far battery seems to be fine n running optimal. Overall a very good handset and worth for money. Thanks to SmartTech store who was very prompt n supportive throughout the purchase. All in all a very satisfied customer. Definitely recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Koushik

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, all good - seller Seagull-UK
customer_reviews.text: I got the phone few months back, working great. We had Samsung before and this one is as good as it gets. Other comments asked about who sold the phone as there are few sellers... Mine was sold by Seagull-UK
customer_reviews.author: A DEL CAMPO DEL CORRAL

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Buy This
customer_reviews.text: I have waited a while before writing a review of this product. Because, rightly or wrongly, one must give each purchase a chance before recommending it (or not) to other potential purchasers. This phone doesn't last for more than 4 or 5 hours, even when it's charged 100%. It runs down by at least 20% per hour until it switches itself off - even if you don't use it. For this reason alone, do not buy this phone from this supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Simon ORourke

customer_reviews.title: S8 still a great phone in 2020
customer_reviews.text: Great little phone; had to get a new phone as my S7 had a problem and I didn't have time to sort it out. S8 is slimmer and thinner, great screen and easy to manage. Mobile_Deals - excellent service and the phone is in very good condition! A minor scratch on the screen but barely see it when in use. Will use them again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rai

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fabulous phone! Smaller than my previous Samsung Galaxy S7, and with a good few new features! My only con is that the batyery does not last long although I make sure not to have any apps running in the background! However, it charges up in a jiffy!All in all very pleased though!
customer_reviews.author: Bbr

customer_reviews.title: Buy a case to protect it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. He dropped it in the bathroom and cracked the edge of the screen but not much - I've dropped my small SE Iphone many times and been lucky - maybe it's because it's larger and didn't have a good case on it - he's bought a better case now.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Ordered from PhoneBox UK.
customer_reviews.text: Brought from PhoneBox Uk. Order placed on the evening of 21 May and arrived in the morning of 23 May. Having had the same phone for over 4 year i finally had to bite the bullet and fork out for a new samsung.very pleased with the quick delivery time and the phone arrived new in original sealed box. Very pleased with the samsung s8 although it is to soon to give a more detailed review
customer_reviews.author: leslie mayles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone for an excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second phone I have brought from this company in the past 6 months as one was stolen the other week. It's a brilliant phone, screen is just amazing. The phone is very light. Both times I have ordered this phone it has arrived very quickly, very impressed. Phone is brand new and comes in an sealed box so it is a genuine phone and a really good price. Things can be backed up to Samsung cloud which is similar to iCloud so I was able to get back all of my information from my stolen phone.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: very pretty and fast
customer_reviews.text: Genuine phone, very pretty and fast. Worth giving up on iPhones for 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Ben S.

customer_reviews.title: From IOS to Android
customer_reviews.text: I've changed my IPhone 5s to Samsung S8 and I don't regret. Came during one week. Brand new package. Phone without even fingerprint. Excellent. Design is just beautiful. Phone is fast and making a good of quality photos and videos. I can't even complain about battery as it's lasts for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mro_owka

customer_reviews.title: I am really pleased with my new phone
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with my new phone. Arrived the day after order, before 11after paying extra delivery charge. Sealed box, extra padded envelope on the outside. The phone itself works perfectly .. charged it and been on it all afternoon .. successfully
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall great phone but...
customer_reviews.text: ...it is not a wireless phone, it's always connected to charger or power bank because the battery life is a joke, seriously.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: as a previous iphone devotee i just love this and much easier to adjust than i expected
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Really good phone, also lots of extra included like headphones , cable to transfer data from your old samsung, charger etc.

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like Bixby, but everything else is good. I just wish that it did not need to be updated so often. This is true of all Samsung phones though, in my opinion.

customer_reviews.title: Lush graphics...Very practical phone
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive. Need a case for definite. It's like trying to hang on to, a wet bar of soap. Love the weightyness and the sleek feel of the phone. I can comfortably load all my favourite apps without running out of space.
customer_reviews.author: J.Bear

customer_reviews.title: Love This Phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone because of the screen, both its clarity and sensitivity and the robustness of the phone, despite its slimness. It recharges really quickly has good battery life and I certainly wouldn't waste your money on the S9.

product_meta.title: Samsung Smartphone Galaxy S8 64GB UK Version - Midnight Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Midnight BlackThe revolutionary design of the Galaxy S8 begins from the inside out. We rethought every part of the phone's layout to break through the confines of the smartphone screen. So all you see is pure content and no bezel. It's the biggest, most immersive screen on a Galaxy smartphone of this size. And it's easy to hold in one hand. Camera Features: VDIS (Video Digital Image Stabilization), HDR (High Dynamic Range), Selective focus (Bokeh effect), Virtual shot, Motion photo, Filters, Stickers, Stamps, Grid line, Location tags, Timer, Quick launch, Voice control. Rear Camera Pro mode - Panorama, Slow motion, Hyperlapse, Food mode, Save as RAW file. Infinity Display: a bezel-less, full-frontal, edge-to-edge screen. Default resolution is Full HD+ and can be changed to Quad HD+(WQHD+) in Settings. Screen measured diagonally as a full rectangle without accounting for the rounded corners. Video Recording: 4K video recording at 30 fps, 1080p HD video recording at 30 fps or 60 fps, 720p HD video recording at 30 fps, VDIS (Video Digital Image Stabilization), Digital Zoom 8x, High CRI LED Flash, Slow Motion video support for 720p at 240 fps, Hyperlapse video with stabilization, Continuous Autofocus video, Face Detection, Tracking AF, Take 9-megapixel still photos while recording 4K video, Playback Zoom, Video Location tags

BOX CONTAINS
Samsung S8 Midnight Black, USB Cable, Earphone, Ejection pin, USB power adaptor, USB Connector (USB Type-C), Micro USB Connector
feature_bullets: 5.8” QuadHD + sAMOLED display – Rounded-corner Infinity Display and symmetrical metal sides that blend effortlessly for a seamless look(unlocked)
IP68-rated water and dust resistant with a powerful 10nm mobile AP for multi-tasking
Dual pixel 12MP camera with F1.7 lens and enhanced image processing. 8MP front camera with facial recognition for smart autofocus
3,000mAh battery with fast charging capabilities via USB Type-C. Wireless Charger Convertible
Expandable memory up to 256GB for storing all your photos, movies and music
